airframe.name: pt_ant
airframe.makefile:
tunnel.ARCHDIR = $(ARCH)
tunnel.CFLAGS += -DFBW -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"conf_demo.h\" -DUSE_LED -DSYS_TIME_LED=1 tunnel.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/uart_tunnel.c
ARCH=lpc21
FLASH_MODE = IAP PT_ANT = antenna
main.ARCHDIR = $(ARCH)
main.CFLAGS += -DBOARD_CONFIG=\"conf_demo.h\" -I$(PT_ANT) main.srcs = $(PT_ANT)/pt_ant_main.c
main.CFLAGS += -DPERIODIC_FREQUENCY='60.' -DUSE_SYS_TIME main.srcs += mcu_periph/sys_time.c $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/sys_time_arch.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_LED
main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/armVIC.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART0 -DUART0_BAUD=B38400 main.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/mcu_periph/uart_arch.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=PprzTransport -DDOWNLINK_DEVICE=Uart0 main.srcs += subsystems/datalink/downlink.c subsystems/datalink/pprz_transport.c $(PT_ANT)/pt_ant_telemetry.c
main.CFLAGS += -DDATALINK=PPRZ -DPPRZ_UART=Uart0 main.srcs += $(PT_ANT)/pt_ant_datalink.c
main.srcs += $(PT_ANT)/pt_ant_motors.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_AMI601 -DI2C_BUF_LEN=32 main.srcs += AMI601.c i2c.c $(SRC_ARCH)/i2c_hw.c
#main.srcs += pt_ant_estimator.c
main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_UART1 -DUART1_BAUD=B9600 #main.CFLAGS += -DUSE_GPS -DUBX -DGPS_LINK=Uart1 #main.CFLAGS += -DGPS_USER_CALLBACK=pt_ant_estimator_update_self_gps -DGPS_USER_CALLBACK_HEADER=\"pt_ant_estimator.h\" #main.CFLAGS += -DGPS_CONFIGURE -DGPS_BAUD=38400 #main.srcs += gps_ubx.c gps.c
